div.p: This code system http://www.ncpdp.org/PrescriptionOriginCode defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: Indicates whether the prescription was transmitted as an electronic prescription, by phone, by fax, or as a written paper copy. NCPDP field # 419-DJ.

copyright.value: NCPDP codes are available by subscription at ncpdp.org. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
